data.lyric:
[ti:Find My Way (Explicit)]
[ar:DaBaby]
[al:Find My Way (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]Find My Way (Explicit) - DaBaby
[00:00.38]Lyrics by：Jonathan Lyndale Kirk/De'Juane Dunwood
[00:00.77]Composed by：Jonathan Lyndale Kirk/De'Juane Dunwood
[00:01.16]Wait a minute who are you
[00:03.14]Ayy yo K.i.D
[00:03.80]I keep it loaded when I ride 'cause I'm still a n***a
[00:06.12]I f**k with her to ease my mind 'cause I be in my feelings
[00:08.35]And every single person in my life tell me I'm their hero
[00:10.78]But when it's up and it go down they treat me like the villain
[00:13.16]Guess I forgot to mention
[00:14.15]I'm just a n***a with a broken heart tryna find my way back home back home
[00:19.05]And I'm sittin' here with the car in park while she ride d**k to my song ooh
[00:24.22]I know the feelin' ain't it okay
[00:25.53]You ever feel the way I feel you know it feel amazin' let's go
[00:27.74]I had a b***h we used to kick it she was feelin' Baby mwah mwah mwah
[00:30.13]She stepped on my heart had me feelin' basic D**n
[00:32.52]You know how people like to come back when you level up uh-huh
[00:34.70]I made the change you stayed the same I gotta ahead of ya
[00:36.95]Guess I been tryin' to free up some time in my schedule but uh-huh
[00:39.34]When opportunity knockin' I never say no
[00:41.45]'Cause I been busy catchin' the blessing I used to pray for let's go
[00:44.07]Stackin' up the bag and like Tetris we playin' LEGOs
[00:45.96]And everyday I pray to God that a n***a don't try to play though
[00:48.50]'Cause I don't like to play beat and gave a n***a a halo Boom boom boom
[00:50.94]Thinkin' 'bout the people I lost know I got some angels
[00:53.17]Chillin' with my freak when we f**k it ease my anger
[00:55.36]Takin' selfies with my b***h she keep switchin' up different angles
[00:57.69]And no I never kept me a b***h but I always keep me a banger boom boom
[00:59.79]I keep it loaded when I ride 'cause I'm still a n***a ah
[01:02.03]I f**k with her to ease my mind 'cause I been in my feelings
[01:04.20]And every single person in my life tell me I'm their hero
[01:06.75]But when it's up and it go down they treat me like the villain
[01:09.01]Guess I forgot to mention
[01:10.10]I'm just a n***a with a broken heart tryna find my way back home back home
[01:14.76]I'm sittin' here with the car in park while she ride d**k to my song ooh
[01:20.14]I let her ride again
[01:21.44]She spread her legs and open up I end up slidin' in okay
[01:23.72]She know the s**t excitin' you is not excitin' him me
[01:26.06]She swallow me up every mornin' like a vitamin yup
[01:28.41]He know to come look where I'm at he wanna find his b***h she with me
[01:30.73]Know I'm aggressive when she kiss me like to bite her lip brr
[01:33.14]I don't be makin' love songs it don't excite a jit no
[01:35.32]Real n***a I got feelings I'm not hiding it Okay let's go
[01:37.70]Still pimpin' tell the b***h I really like her friend Yeah b***h
[01:40.13]You know the pussy good 'cause I be tryna fly it in Yeah b***h
[01:42.40]I text her once she don't respond I won't say Hi again b***h
[01:44.75]She kiss me once and let me slide I never lie again Let's go
[01:46.96]My name not Melly I got murder on my mind again uh-huh
[01:49.39]I'm with the s**ts I kill him twice if he could die again
[01:51.61]And if you think 'bout tryin' me better try again
[01:53.90]'Cause I'ma let him spin if he don't drop then we gon' slide again doo doo doo doo
[01:55.84]I keep it loaded when I ride 'cause I'm still a n***a ah
[01:58.00]I f**k with her to use my mind 'cause I be in my feelings
[02:00.14]And every single person in my life tell me I'm their hero
[02:02.56]But when it's up and it go down they treat me like the villain
[02:04.96]Guess I forgot to mention
[02:06.16]I'm just a n***a with a broken heart tryna find my way back home back
[02:10.76]I'm sittin' here with the car in park while she ride d**k to my song b***h
data.trans:
[ti:Find My Way (Explicit)]
[ar:DaBaby]
[al:Find My Way (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.38]//
[00:00.77]//
[00:01.16]等一下 你是谁呀
[00:03.14]我是DJ K.i.D
[00:03.80]我随时随地把枪上好膛 因为我依然是个街头小子
[00:06.12]我和她一起玩 放松我的心情 因为我心神不宁
[00:08.35]我生活中的每个人都说我是他们的英雄
[00:10.78]但当繁华落尽 他们都把我当坏人
[00:13.16]我好像忘记提起
[00:14.15]我只是个心碎的男人 想要找到回家的路
[00:19.05]我坐在公园里的车里 而她一边听着我的歌 一边伺候我
[00:24.22]我知道这种感觉 是不是还不错
[00:25.53]你要是体会一下我的感受 你就知道那感觉有多爽
[00:27.74]我曾有个女人 我们曾经过得很开心 她很理解我的心情
[00:30.13]可后来她践踏我的心 让我感觉自己很平庸
[00:32.52]你知道 在你飞黄腾达之后 那些曾经离你而去的人都会回来的
[00:34.70]我已经改变 你还是那个德行 我超越了你
[00:36.95]我也想百忙之中抽出一点空 但是
[00:39.34]当机遇来敲门 我从不会拒绝
[00:41.45]因为我一直忙着追寻曾经渴求的幸福 我们动起来
[00:44.07]不断积累财富 就像俄罗斯方块 我们就像在玩乐高积木
[00:45.96]每天我都向上帝祈祷 希望不要有人玩弄我
[00:48.50]因为我不想发飙 一旦发飙 就有人要丢掉小命
[00:50.94]我失去了很多朋友 我也拥有很多天使
[00:53.17]和我的女人在一起 缠绵的时候 我就不会那么生气
[00:55.36]和我的女人自拍 她不断变换角度
[00:57.69]我从来不和女人长久在一起 倒是一直都和枪炮在一起
[00:59.79]我随时随地把枪上好膛 因为我依然是个街头小子 
[01:02.03]我和她一起玩 放松我的心情 因为我一直心神不宁
[01:04.20]我生活中的每个人都说我是他们的英雄
[01:06.75]但当繁华落尽 他们都把我当坏人
[01:09.01]我好像忘记提起
[01:10.10]我只是个心碎的男人 想要找到回家的路
[01:14.76]我坐在公园里的车里 而她一边听着我的歌 一边伺候我
[01:20.14]我让她又和我亲热一次
[01:21.44]她真的是对我投怀送抱 搔首弄姿 我也不好拒绝了
[01:23.72]她知道那些让你激动的事情 并不能让我激动
[01:26.06]每天早上她都会把我伺候得超级舒服
[01:28.41]他总想知道我在什么地方 他想找到他的女人 她和我在一起
[01:30.73]我是很有侵略性的 当她亲吻我的时候 我特别喜欢咬她嘴唇
[01:33.14]我不写情歌 情歌让我没有兴致
[01:35.32]我这人很耿直 有什么感受 我从来不掩饰
[01:37.70]依然在街头混 告诉那个女人 我喜欢她的朋友
[01:40.13]你知道这娘们真的很不错 我都想和她尽情狂欢一次
[01:42.40]我给她发一次短信 她要是不回 我就再也不会联系她
[01:44.75]她亲吻我一次 让我和她亲热 我再也不会撒谎
[01:46.96]我虽不是Melly 但我有属于我的《murder on my mind》
[01:49.39]我就是这么狠 如果他大难不死 我可不会善罢甘休
[01:51.61]如果你想试试我 那就来试试吧
[01:53.90]我会让他吃不了兜着走 要是他没有倒下 那我们的炮火就不会停下
[01:55.84]我随时随地把枪上好膛 因为我依然是个街头小子
[01:58.00]我和她一起玩 放松我的心情 因为我心神不宁
[02:00.14]我生活中的每个人都说我是他们的英雄
[02:02.56]但当繁华落尽 他们都把我当坏人
[02:04.96]我好像忘记提起
[02:06.16]我只是个心碎的男人 想要找到回家的路
[02:10.76]我坐在公园里的车里 而她一边听着我的歌 一边伺候我
